mapper.insert: INSERT INTO nv_svc_main (t_id, server_id, start_tm, end_tm, service_sts, service_nm, send_mode, service_type, client, user_id, mts_cnt, target_cnt, channel, etc_info, err_msg, display_yn, status, del_yn, rtn_mail_cnt, rcv_cnfm_em, lnk_trc_em, rcv_cnfm_ec, rcv_trc_ec, rcv_usr_def, update_tm, create_tm) VALUES (#{tId}, #{serverId}, #{startTm, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{endTm, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{serviceSts, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{serviceNm, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sendMode, jdbcType=CHAR}, #{serviceType, jdbcType=CHAR}, #{client, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mtsCnt}, #{targetCnt}, #{channel, jdbcType=CHAR}, #{etcInfo, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{errMsg, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{displayYn, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{delYn, jdbcType=CHAR}, #{rtnMailCnt}, #{rcvCnfmEm}, #{lnkTrcEm}, #{rcvCnfmEc}, #{rcvTrcEc}, #{rcvUsrDef}, #{updateTm, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTm, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: SELECT t_id, server_id, start_tm, end_tm, service_sts, service_nm, send_mode, service_type, client, user_id , mts_cnt, target_cnt, channel, etc_info, err_msg, display_yn, status, create_tm , (SELECT max(update_tm) FROM nv_svc_mts WHERE t_id = a.t_id) update_tm FROM nv_svc_main a WHERE t_id = #{tId}
